ExampleSentence: Il dottore mi ha prescritto uno {{c1::sciroppo}} per la tosse.
TranslationSentence: The doctor prescribed me a syrup for the cough.

ExampleSentence: Ho una {{c1::tosse}} secca che non passa.
TranslationSentence: I have a dry cough that won't go away.

ExampleSentence: Ecco la {{c1::ricevuta}} per la visita medica.
TranslationSentence: Here's the receipt for the medical visit.
I need to put ice on the wound.
My right knee hurts.
The fever is high, 39 degrees.

ExampleSentence: Il dottore ha fatto un {{c1::punto}} di sutura.
TranslationSentence: The doctor made a suture stitch.
I have a terrible stiff neck.

ExampleSentence: La ragazza è {{c1::ubriaca}} e non può guidare.
TranslationSentence: The girl is drunk and can't drive.
I have a terrible hangover this morning.

ExampleSentence: Il {{c1::dopo sbornia}} è sempre peggio della sbornia.
TranslationSentence: The hangover is always worse than being drunk.

ExampleSentence: Sono {{c1::allegro}} oggi, nonostante il mal di testa.
TranslationSentence: I'm cheerful today, despite the headache.

ExampleSentence: Mi sento {{c1::così}} stanco che non riesco a concentrarmi.
TranslationSentence: I feel so tired that I can't concentrate.

ExampleSentence: Mi fa male la {{c1::schiena}} dopo aver sollevato i pesi.
TranslationSentence: My back hurts after lifting weights.
I'm sunburned from the sun.
The sun can burn the skin.
My skin is burned from the sun.
I got sunstroke at the beach.

ExampleSentence: Spero che non {{c1::succeda}} niente di grave.
TranslationSentence: I hope nothing serious happens.
It will take some time to heal.

ExampleSentence: Il chirurgo ha fatto una {{c1::sutura}} perfetta.
TranslationSentence: The surgeon made a perfect suture.

ExampleSentence: Il dottore ha tolto i {{c1::punti}} oggi.
TranslationSentence: The doctor removed the stitches today.
